title: 在REMIX 3D分享你的建筑！
author: 广药
txt_content:
[bili=15480042]1[/bili]
SHARE BUILDS ON REMIX 3D!
在REMIX 3D分享你的建筑！

Check out Minecraft's new export feature!
快去试试Minecraft的最新导出功能！

The Better Together update didn’t just bring you cross-platform play. It didn’t just bring you Marketplace content accessible across compatible devices. It didn’t just bring you massive servers, new minigames, maps, adventures, armor stands, banners, parrots, game rules, start options, player permissions, safety settings, tutorials and invite links. It didn’t just bring you coarse dirt. Oh no! Tucked away in the massive update were even more subtle and powerful features: like the ability for you to export your Minecraft builds, edit them, personalise them and share them online!
独乐不如众乐更新不仅给你带来了跨平台游戏和跨平台设备上的商店内容，还有大量的服务器、小游戏、冒险地图、盔甲架、旗帜、鹦鹉、游戏规则、存档选项、玩家权限、保证玩家安全、游戏内教程和领域邀请链接，当然还有砂土方块！啊，在大规模的特性更新中，还隐藏着一个微妙且强大的功能：你可以带出你的Minecraft建筑，并且编辑和个性化它们，然后在网上分享它们！

Remix 3D is a new 3D community that lets you browse thousands of fancy 3D creations right from your browser - and contribute to it too! We’ve built support into Minecraft for Windows 10 so that you can use structure blocks to select parts of your world and export them to Remix 3D.Remix 3D是一个新的3D社区，它可以让你从你的浏览器中找到成千上万的精美的3D渲染作品，我们已经为Win10上的Minecraft建立了支持，这样你就可以使用结构方块来选择你的部分存档，然后导出到Remix 3D了。
Check out what other Minecrafters have been uploading to Remix 3D here.
点击我看看其他的Minecraft玩家在Remix 3D上传的作品！Remix 3D works alongside Paint 3D, too, so you can deface - uh, I mean decorate your creations further.
Remix 3D也可以使用微软的3D画图编辑，因此你可以画 -呃，我的意思是，进一步装饰你的作品了。

Remix 3D is in on-going development, so you can expect lots more ** functionality down the line. Right now, you can even use the Mixed Reality Viewer app to place your Minecraft builds in photos of the real world!
Remix 3D正在开发中，所以你还可以期待更多更令人兴奋的信功能。现在，你甚至可以使用Mixed Reality Viewer APP将你的Minecraft建筑放置到真实世界的照片上！

** stuff! Watch the video above for a quick look at how it all works.
超赞的东西！看看上面的视频（审核中），看看它是怎么工作的。
